comments:
Making Lawyers' Lives Easier. 

Evatt AI is an AI Software for lawyers. Built using the world's most powerful AI, trained in the common law, and with access to 45 million cases through legal databases. Evatt AI can save you 2 hours per day.

Evatt AI is capable of:
Advanced Legal Research 
Contract Drafting
Document Review

All powered by highly intelligent encryption technology and database access - to ensure client attorney privilege and pinpoint accurate responses.

We service lawyers, entrepreneurs and consultants in: The United States (US), The United Kingdom (UK), Australia, India, Canada and New Zealand.

Try Evatt AI Today:
https://www.evatt.ai/

Sign up here:
https://evattai.com/

Evatt AI 
Making Lawyers' Lives Easier
